name: Frutas ao Combate
description:
This game aims to raise people to consume more fruit and use it as a weapon against current health problems.

Frutas ao Combate is nothing more than a sublime attempt to combat various health problems. Make as many points against health-damaging food and system disorders as possible. 

Made at Game Jam: Games For Good 2019 

https://fabrica-iade.pt
https://www.apcoi.pt/

[Play directly here]

Have fun!
